scripts.seed: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { Client } = require('pg'); const config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('database.json')); const client = new Client(config); const seedSQL = fs.readFileSync('seeds/001_initial_seed.sql', 'utf8'); client.connect().then(() => client.query(seedSQL)).then(() => { console.log('Seed data inserted successfully'); client.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error(err); client.end(); process.exit(1); });"
